MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA1 and KA3 postcode areas of Kilmarnock. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7pm to finalise an underground cable repair close to Glen Farrar Way substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:36PM on Sunday 18 October 2020.
